import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function FilterTableItems() { const [userInp,setUserInp]=useState('') useEffect(()=>{ filter() },[userInp]) const filter=()=>{ const table=document.querySelector('#table') const tbody=table.querySelector('tbody') const rows=tbody.querySelectorAll('tr') //console.log(rows) for(let i=0;i-1 ) rows[i].style.display="" else rows[i].style.display="none" } } return (
setUserInp(e.target.value)} />
